verse:
बृहच्च तद्‌ दिव्यमचिन्त्यरूपं सूक्ष्माच्च तत्‌ सूक्ष्मतरं विभाति। 
दूरात्‌ सुदूरे तदिहान्तिके च पश्यन्त्विहैव निहितं गुहायाम्‌ ॥

terms.सूक्ष्मतरं विभाति: it manifests in a subtler form
terms.पश्यन्तु इहैव: see it right here, right now

meaning: Meaning:The divine form of the Supreme Being is vast and incomprehensible. It manifests in various forms, each subtler than the previous. It can be perceived both at a distant place and in close proximity. The essence of the divine resides within, hidden in a cave.
